collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### How This Policy Applies  

This Policy describes the information we collect from you, how we use that
information and our legal basis for doing so.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### What We Collect and Receive

In order for you to create an account with AIPEX and use our Services, we need
to collect and process certain information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Depending on your use of the
Services, that may include:

  * Information you provide by completing forms on AIPEX websites — your name, your company name, email and postal addresses, telephone number, country of residence, login, and password details.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We may ask for this information if you register as a user of the Services, subscribe to communication we offer, upload or submit content through AIPEX, or if you contact us;

  * Details of any requests or transactions you make through the Services.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: AIPEX partners with other companies (such as Braintree) for payment processing, and the payment information you submit is collected and used by them in accordance with their privacy policies (for Braintree’s, [click here](https://www.braintreepayments.com/legal)).

collection.label: OMITTED
OMITTED
OMITTED
OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### European Union Users

Data protection law in Europe requires a “lawful basis” for collecting and
retaining personal information from citizens or residents of the European
Economic Area.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: * Legal compliance: Sometimes the law says we need to collect and use your data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: We sometimes require your data to pursue our legitimate interests in a way that might reasonably be expected as part of running our business and that does not materially impact your rights, freedom or interests.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We also collect and maintain aggregated, anonymized or pseudonymized
information which we may retain indefinitely to protect the safety and
security of our Site, improve our Services or comply with legal obligations.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### Data Transfers

Because AIPEX is a US-based company, your information will be collected and
processed in the United States.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### Cookies and other Technologies

#### **What they are**

Cookies are small data files that are issued to your device when you visit a
website and that store information about your use of a service.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Pixel tags
(which are also called clear GIFs, web beacons, or pixels) are little snippets
of code or tiny images embedded on websites and in email that help us learn
how you interact with our site and emails.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
#### **How they work**

When you visit AIPEX, our web server sends a cookie to your device, which
allows us to recognize your device (but not the specific person using it).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
By
associating the identification numbers in the cookies with other account
information when, for example, you log in to our Services, we know that the
cookie information relates to your user account.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Similarly, pixel tags on
AIPEX and in email communications help us identify how your device is being
used to interact with AIPEX content.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We may use third party software development kits (SDK) in
our Sites to collect information about activity in the app, the type of device
and operating system it is running on and how the Services are functioning.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
For example an SDK may send us a report if the Service crashes, and reports on
which features are used more than others.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
* **Analytics and research  
** Cookies and other technologies also help us to understand, improve, and
research features and content on AIPEX sites.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
For example, we may use cookies
to determine which types of browsers or devices are accessing AIPEX.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
In some
cases, our partners may use cookies to provide us with information about your
interactions with their services.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
To opt out of having your online behavior collected for advertising
purposes, [click here](http://optout.aboutads.info/?c=2#!/).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We follow industry-standard practices to protect the data we
collect and maintain, including using Transport Layer Security (TLS) to
encrypt information as it travels over the internet.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
AIPEX does not knowingly collect any personal
information from children under the age of 13 and children under 13 are not
permitted to register for an account or use our Services.
